changeSet.author: wpoteat
changeSet.comment: Copy data from azure_subscription_id field to billing_account_id field
changeSet.sql: update events set data = jsonb_set(data::jsonb, '{"billing_account_id"}', data -> 'azure_subscription_id') where jsonb_path_exists(data -> 'billing_provider', '$.** ? (@ == "azure")') and data -> 'azure_subscription_id' is not null

changeSet.author: wpoteat
changeSet.comment: Update billing_account_id field for azure billable account change
changeSet.sql: update tally_snapshots set billing_account_id = regexp_replace(billing_account_id,'.*;(.*)', '\1') where billing_provider='azure'
